thread.title: NetSuite CEO Zach Nelson to Speak at Annual GE Minds + Machines Conference
thread.title_full: NetSuite CEO Zach Nelson to Speak at Annual GE Minds + Machines Conference

title: NetSuite CEO Zach Nelson to Speak at Annual GE Minds + Machines Conference
text: NetSuite CEO Zach Nelson to Speak at Annual GE Minds + Machines Conference   13:31:24 NetSuite CEO Zach Nelson to Speak at Annual GE Minds +... -- SAN MATEO, Calif.  NetSuite. Where Business is Going. NetSuite. Where Business is Going. <-  <- stripped tags -> SAN MATEO, Calif.   NetSuite Inc. (NYSE: [[UEdFZ2NtVnNQVndpYm05bWIyeHNiM2RjSWlCb2NtVm1QU2RvZEhSd09pOHZjM1IxWkdsdkxUVXVabWx1WVc1amFXRnNZMjl1ZEdWdWRDNWpiMjB2Y0hKdVpYZHpQMUJoWjJVOVVYVnZkR1VtVkdsamEyVnlQVTRuSUhSaGNtZGxkRDBuWDJKc1lXNXJKeUIwYVhSc1pUMG5UaWNnYjI1amJHbGphejBuYkdsdWEwOXVRMnhwWTJzb2RHaHBjeWtuSUhKbGJEMG5ibTltYjJ4c2IzY25QazQ4TDJFK3w=]]), the industry's leading provider of [[]]-based financials / [[UEdFZ2NtVnNQVndpYm05bWIyeHNiM2RjSWlCdmJtTnNhV05yUFNkc2FXNXJUMjVEYkdsamF5aDBhR2x6S1NjZ2FISmxaajFjSW1oMGRIQTZMeTkzZDNjdWJtVjBjM1ZwZEdVdVkyOXRMM0J2Y25SaGJDOXdjbTlrZFdOMGN5OXVaWFJ6ZFdsMFpTOWxjbkF2YldGcGJpNXphSFJ0YkZ3aUlISmxiRDFjSW01dlptOXNiRzkzWENJZ2RHRnlaMlYwUFZ3aVgySnNZVzVyWENJK1JWSlFQQzloUGc9PXw=]] and [[]] software suites, today announced that NetSuite CEO Zach Nelson will speak at the Annual GE (NYSE: [[]]) Minds + Machines Conference, the fourth annual gathering of customers, developers, partners and industry executives globally. The event will host 1,000+ customers, developers, thought leaders, partners, and media for focused sessions on the state of the Industrial Internet. The agenda will include deep-dive presentations on GE's Predix platform, strategies for Asset Performance Management, and adjacent technologies driving successful Industrial Internet outcomes today. Serving as CEO of NetSuite since 2002, leading it through its IPO, Nelson has been a central figure in the rise of cloud computing. In his presentation, being held at 9:00 a.m. PT on Wednesday, Sept. 30 , Nelson will address the opportunities presented by the intersection of the Industrial Internet, the Internet of Things (IoT), and cloud computing. "Today's customers demand an experience that requires businesses to take bold action and constantly innovate, while the Industrial Internet and IoT require a platform designed from the ground up to enable rapid change," said Zach Nelson , CEO of NetSuite. "NetSuite's Business Cloud empowers businesses to connect information and operational technology to any business model -- whether it is B2C, B2B or B2N (B2Anything) and execute on their bold and innovative ideas." [[]] will be held Sept. 29 - Oct.1 at Fort Mason in San Francisco . Today, more than 24,000 companies and subsidiaries depend on NetSuite to run complex, mission-critical business processes globally in the cloud. Since its inception in 1998, NetSuite has established itself as the leading provider of enterprise-ready cloud business management suites of enterprise resource planning (ERP), customer relationship management (CRM), and ecommerce applications for businesses of all sizes. Many FORTUNE 100 companies rely on NetSuite to accelerate innovation and business transformation. NetSuite continues its success in delivering the best cloud business management suites to businesses around the world, enabling them to lower IT costs significantly while increasing productivity, as the global adoption of the cloud accelerates. Follow NetSuite's [[UEdFZ2NtVnNQVndpYm05bWIyeHNiM2RjSWlCdmJtTnNhV05yUFNkc2FXNXJUMjVEYkdsamF5aDBhR2x6S1NjZ2FISmxaajFjSW1oMGRIQTZMeTkzZDNjdWJtVjBjM1ZwZEdWaWJHOW5jeTVqYjIwdlhDSWdjbVZzUFZ3aWJtOW1iMnhzYjNkY0lpQjBZWEpuWlhROVhDSmZZbXhoYm10Y0lqNURiRzkxWkNCaWJHOW5QQzloUGc9PXw=]], NetSuite's [[UEdFZ2NtVnNQVndpYm05bWIyeHNiM2RjSWlCdmJtTnNhV05yUFNkc2FXNXJUMjVEYkdsamF5aDBhR2x6S1NjZ2FISmxaajFjSW1oMGRIQTZMeTkzZDNjdVptRmpaV0p2YjJzdVkyOXRMMjVsZEhOMWFYUmxYQ0lnY21Wc1BWd2libTltYjJ4c2IzZGNJaUIwWVhKblpYUTlYQ0pmWW14aGJtdGNJajVHWVdObFltOXZhend2WVQ0PXw=]] page and [[UEdFZ2NtVnNQVndpYm05bWIyeHNiM2RjSWlCdmJtTnNhV05yUFNkc2FXNXJUMjVEYkdsamF5aDBhR2x6S1NjZ2FISmxaajFjSW1oMGRIQTZMeTkzZDNjdWRIZHBkSFJsY2k1amIyMHZibVYwYzNWcGRHVmNJaUJ5Wld3OVhDSnViMlp2Ykd4dmQxd2lJSFJoY21kbGREMWNJbDlpYkdGdWExd2lQa0JPWlhSVGRXbDBaVHd2WVQ0PXw=]] Twitter handle for real-time updates.
